cause.description:
Milwaukee Artist Resource Network (MARN) is a nonprofit art-service organization dedicated to enriching the community by supporting individual literary, performing and visual artists. MARN empowers artists with access to educational and professional resources and creates a network for communication and collaboration. MARN sponsors arts-related events, including and involving other organizations and businesses, making the arts accessible to people of all economic and educational backgrounds.
1. Individual literary, performing and visual artists need educational and professional resources as well as a network for communication and collaboration.
2. The arts enrich the community. By Supporting artist we build a better city and more motivated, literate citizens.
3. The arts must be accessible to people of all economic and educational backgrounds.
cause.mission: provide business and educational resources to literary, performing and visual artists.
cause.name: Milwaukee Artist Resource Network (MARN)
